about_the_game:
All the strategic depth of deckbuilding classics taken to the extreme! Manage combat on a tactical map, pursuing divine boons and avoiding the deadly spread of corruption in Waystones, a turn-based roguelike deckbuilder!

Hex-Based Tactical Combat

Avoid detrimental status hexes, collect powerful boons, and use obstacles to your advantage while moving around the tactical map. Crafting your deck meets new depth with various movement based cards and multi-target patterns!

Craft Unique Decks

Enhance your deck with hundreds of card options. Carefully select and upgrade your cards to create a deck with potent combinations. Use your deck to defeat enemies on your journey between Waystones and cleanse the corruption!

Unearth relics to further empower your deck and unlock devastating synergies. These powerful artifacts can turn the tide in the most dire circumstances, but beware, as relics often come with a steep price…

Infinite Replayability

Every run of Waystones is completely unique thanks to procedurally generated maps and RNG-based card rewards, encounters, and more. With hundreds of cards and relics, dozens of encounters and events, no two playthroughs will be the same.

Features

  • 3 wildly different classes: Dauntless, Ascendant, and Shaderunner.

  • 200+ cards and Quest cards that lead to powerful rewards.

  • 100+ relics found in events, Waystones, elites, and boss fights.

  • 60+ enemies with different abilities, movement, range, and environmental interaction.

  • Procedurally generated endless playthroughs across 3 stages.
